## Skill acquisition plan for the week

#### Survival
- install R
- input data
- creat a basic graph

#### Essential
- modify graphs titles, axes, legends
- produce dynamic report using markdown (.md)
- source files

#### Advanced
-  produce dynamic report using Rmarkdown (.Rmd)
